metadata.gitb:name: First test suite to get into the Interoperability Test Bed.

gitb:actor.gitb:name: Trust Network Participant simulated by the Test Bed
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: The Interoperability Test Bed is assumed to be an actor of the Trust Network thus is a simulated participant.

gitb:actor.gitb:name: Trust Network Participant B
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: This is the Trust Network Participant who is providing services to other participants and expects them to connect. His access details are shared through the Trust Network.

gitb:actor.gitb:name: Trust Network Anchor
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: Trust Network Anchor which receives and distributes PKI-material within a Trust Network. Also called the Gateway of the key network to manage keys. Also called Trust Network Gateway (TNG).

gitb:actor.gitb:name: QR Code Holder
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: A person who holds a QR code that should be validated by the GDHCN backend.

gitb:actor.gitb:name: QR Code Validator
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: A (backend) system that validates QR codes.
